Sentencas: A series of barium-aluminum-borosilicate system glasses, designated as GC9, with the formula of 34BaO-4.5Al(2)O(3)-9.5B(2)O(3)-34SiO(2)-1ZrO(2)-xLa(2)O(3)-(17-x)CaO, where x = 0, 1, 3, 5, 7 in mol%, have been developed as the high-temperature sealants using for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Effects of lanthanum-to-calcium ratio on the thermal and crystalline properties of BaO-Al2O3-B2O3-SiO2 based glass sealants for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The effects of lanthanum-to-calcium (La/Ca) ratios on the thermal and crystalline properties of the GC9 glass were investigated in the present study.
Titulo: Effects of lanthanum-to-calcium ratio on the thermal and crystalline properties of BaO-Al2O3-B2O3-SiO2 based glass sealants for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The density, glass transition temperature (T-g), and softening temperature (T-s) of the GC9 glass increase with increasing the La/Ca ratio.
Titulo: Effects of lanthanum-to-calcium ratio on the thermal and crystalline properties of BaO-Al2O3-B2O3-SiO2 based glass sealants for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The average coefficient of thermal expansion (CTE) in the temperature range from 25 to 650 degrees C for the glass system varies from 8.25 x 10(-6) to 9.49 x 10(-6)K(-1).
Titulo: Effects of lanthanum-to-calcium ratio on the thermal and crystalline properties of BaO-Al2O3-B2O3-SiO2 based glass sealants for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The T-g, T-s and CTE for the optimized GC9 glass are 652, 745 degrees C, and 9.48 x 10(-6)K(-1), respectively, at the La/Ca ratio of 0.833.
Titulo: Effects of lanthanum-to-calcium ratio on the thermal and crystalline properties of BaO-Al2O3-B2O3-SiO2 based glass sealants for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: After annealing at 750 degrees C for 4 h in air, the crystallinity of the GC9 glass increases with increasing the La/Ca ratio and the crystalline phase is mainly Ba3La6(SiO4)(6).
Titulo: Effects of lanthanum-to-calcium ratio on the thermal and crystalline properties of BaO-Al2O3-B2O3-SiO2 based glass sealants for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In addition, the GC9 glass with a La/Ca ratio of 0.833 possesses well wetting and adhesion joining with metallic interconnect, and ceramic positive electrode-electrolyte-negative electrode (PEN) plate after sealed at 850 degrees C for 4 h. (C) 2015 The Ceramic Society of Japan.
Titulo: Effects of lanthanum-to-calcium ratio on the thermal and crystalline properties of BaO-Al2O3-B2O3-SiO2 based glass sealants for solid oxide fuel cells
Effects of lanthanum-to-calcium ratio on the thermal and crystalline properties of BaO-Al2O3-B2O3-SiO2 based glass sealants for solid oxide fuel cells
